What is Tiny Pond?

Tiny Pond is a creative studio and consultancy created by Tifa Jade and Mateo Julia-Wise. We worked side-by-side at BoomTV for over three years, collaborating on designs for gaming brands like Mountain Dew, Fortnite, and Xbox.

Now, we're excited to bring the same professionalism, care, and shared passion for design and animation that we brought to the biggest names in gaming, straight to you.

The goal of Tiny Pond is simple: deliver great results, together. When you partner with us, you’re directly supporting independent artists, dedicated to creating exceptional bespoke design systems and assets that set you and your team up for success.

Tiny Pond is a new venture for us, but our experience is vast, and the potential we bring is limitless. Let’s work together and make something amazing. We can't wait to bring your ideas to life.

Tifa Jade Animation Director
she/her

tj@tinypond.studio

Tifa Jade also enjoys going by TJ, and is a creative producer and animation director with over 10 years of experience leading visual projects from concept to delivery. She gained extensive editorial experience working in the post-production department at UFC for over four years, and has had her work featured on UFC broadcasts, Fight Pass, and ESPN.

Now a senior creative producer and freelance animation director, she has taken the lead on development of dynamic animated visuals for esports and gaming brands, working with industry giants like Epic Games, Xbox, and Mountain Dew on experiential marketing campaigns. She loves designing motion identities, bringing experienced animation to esports broadcasts, event promos, websites, and everything in between.

Mateo Julia-Wise Graphic Designer
he/him

mateo@tinypond.studio

Mateo is a well-versed graphic designer with extensive experience in a variety of styles. As creative director of esports powerhouse BoomTV, he's worked with some of the world's leading gaming brands on experiential brand design for marketing campaigns and high-octane esports broadcasts.

Mateo fell in love with design while making event graphics for his college in NYC, and has always been driven by a passion for innovation and creativity. He has since collaborated with prominent brands, influencers, and independent clients alike, always pushing visual identities with experimental and bold design options. His broad experience has shaped him into a highly adaptable and efficient designer, capable of delivering exceptional results, no matter the challenge.

Our Services

Creating cohesive visual identities, tailored to resonate with audiences. We believe in bold visuals that evoke a sense of style, and we develop living online style guides to set you up for success.

Bespoke animated visuals for broadcasts, digital platforms, physical displays and much more. We're capable of robust 2D and 3D animation, so no matter the vision, we're equipped to handle it.

Custom graphics packages for live productions and online broadcasts, tailored to your style with fully animated graphics. Live broadcasts should be dynamic. With our years of experience designing esports tournaments for brands like Xbox and Fortnite, you can count on us to help keep your viewers engaged.

Platform-agnostic assets for your social media timeline, website, and advertising campaigns. Screens aren't one size, and your assets shouldn't be either. We believe in modularity and ease of use.

Strategic advice and leadership to help you bring your creative vision to life with our guidance and collaboration. Whether you need help developing a campaign, or locking down a design style, we'll work with you every step of the way to make sure you're set up for success.

At Tiny Pond, we're big into research and development, exploring innovative approaches to design, animation, and interactive visuals. If something you're looking for isn't on this list, send us a message and we'll let you know how we can help.

Our Values

We believe that the best results come from open communication and shared problem-solving. Through our collaborative approach, we harness our collective strengths and expertise to create impactful results.

Embracing underserved perspectives enriches our work and deepens its impact. Our team is committed to partnering with and supporting causes that make a positive difference. On this team, we foster an environment where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered.

We take pride in our leaps, and we’re always ready to explain our thinking process. Accountability means standing by our work and being transparent about our decisions, fostering trust and integrity in everything we do.

We believe the best results come from expertise and experience. We craft our art with human hands, not AI. We invest in our clients as people, not business partners. We're most successful when we're celebrating human connections and nurturing healthy relationships.

Our goal is to keep things clear and open. Trust goes both ways! We maintain transparency throughout our collaboration, and ask that you grant us the trust we need to make creative decisions you can rely on. Together, we can navigate the waters with clarity and purpose.

We’re dedicated to growth and change, ensuring we remain fresh, innovative, and ready to tackle any challenge. We're committed to innovation, we embrace research and development, and we'll never back down from a worthy challenge.

We don't want you to just dip your toes in the pond. Our aim is to build long-lasting relationships that grow over time. Together, we’ll develop a valuable partnership based on trust and open, friendly collaboration.

Our team believes in making the world better for everyone. We value sustainable practices and positive social impact initiatives, understanding that a thriving pond benefits all. Together, we will work to create a more sustainable and vibrant future.

Our goal is to deliver work that exceeds expectations. When you collaborate with our team, expect us to become your go-to creative solution, naturally adapting to meet your needs and bringing all your visions to life.
